Html: I am specced into Balance of Power which gives the 4% spell hit buff and Rawr shows that in my talent tree. However it does not take this 4% into account when I run the optimizer and I always end up 4% over the hit cap. What can I do to correct this? I never had this problem with previous releases it wasn't until WoW 3.1 came out and the verisons of Rawr that followed all gave me this problem since.

If you're talking about the display showing 17% spell hit, that's because the 4% hit from Balance of Power is currently being displayed along with your gear's hit rating.  If you mouse over the spell hit number, it'll show you the rating, and you will see that it is correct.

Well I updated and ran a fresh copy of the armory of my character and it seemed to have fixed it. It was giving me an insanely high amount of hit and had every piece of gear I had maximizing for +hit. Not sure why but its fine now. Thanks.
